non_compliant.legal provisions: The provided text does not constitute a privacy policy and lacks information on data processing purposes, legal basis, data subject rights, data retention, and security measures. It also doesn't specify how to contact the data controller.
non_compliant.amend: Provide a comprehensive privacy policy outlining data processing practices, legal grounds, data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.), data retention policies, security measures, and contact details of the data controller.
